subject: RE: [junit] JUnit & Ant
messageBody:
Here's mine:

<!-- ==================================================================
-->
<!-- Run all unit testcases
-->
<!-- ==================================================================
-->
<target name="run-tests" depends="compile" description="Runs test cases">
<mkdir dir="${junit.results}"/>

<junit printsummary="no" haltonfailure="yes" haltonerror="yes"
fork="yes" dir="../test">
<classpath>
<path refid="runtime-classpath"/>
</classpath>

<sysproperty key="java.compiler" value="NONE" />
<sysproperty key="java.net.namelookup.cache" value="0" />
<sysproperty key="sun.net.inetaddr.ttl" value="0" />

<formatter type="plain" usefile="no"/>
<formatter type="xml" usefile="yes"/>

<batchtest todir="${junit.results}">
<fileset dir="${src.dir}">
<include name="**/*Test.java"/>
</fileset>
</batchtest>
</junit>
</target>

<!-- ==================================================================
-->
<!-- Run an single testcase
-->
<!-- ==================================================================
-->
<target name="run-singletest" depends="compile" description="Runs a single
test case">
<junit printsummary="no" haltonfailure="yes" haltonerror="yes"
fork="yes" dir="../test">
<classpath>
<path refid="runtime-classpath"/>
</classpath>

<sysproperty key="java.compiler" value="NONE" />
<sysproperty key="java.net.namelookup.cache" value="0" />
<sysproperty key="sun.net.inetaddr.ttl" value="0" />

<formatter type="plain" usefile="false"/>

<test name="${testcase}"/>
</junit>
</target>

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Throw away my code, but never, never throw away my tests.
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Jeffrey D. Brekke Quad/Graphics
Jeff.Brekke@... http://www.qg.com
-----------------------------------------------------------------

> From: Kurt, Oliver [mailto:oliver.kurt@...]

> I'm using this one:
>
> <target name="test" depends="compile">
>
> <mkdir dir="${buildreports}"/>
>
> <junit printsummary="no" haltonfailure="no">
>
> <classpath>
> <pathelement location="${build}" />
> <pathelement path="${java.class.path}" />
> </classpath>
>
> <batchtest todir="${buildreports}">
> <fileset dir="${src}">
> <include name="**/*Test*.java" />
> </fileset>
> <formatter type="xml" />
> </batchtest>
>
> </junit>
> </target>
>

> JUnit task (if
